subsc: Central government administration,Other social services,Adult literacy/non-formal education,Forestry

abstracts.cdata!:
The National Parks Management Project
            will help to strengthen the capability of the National
            Institute of Parks and other public environmental agencies
            to manage Venezuela's national and urban parks, natural
            monuments, and wildlife reserves; to intensify public
            environmental research, training and education efforts; to
            involve the private sector more actively in the
            protection/management of natural resources; and to improve
            the economic sustainability of the national parks and other
            protected areas.  The main project components include:  (a)
            strengthening of parks management and protection; (b)
            environmental research; (c) environmental education; and (d)
            institutional development, including project administration,
            training and technical assistance.
